name: CGEventSourceStateID
desc: Constants that specify the possible source states of an event source.

items.name: case privateState
items.desc: Specifies that an event source should use a private event state table.

items.name: case combinedSessionState
items.desc: Specifies that an event source should use the event state table that reflects the combined state of all event sources posting to the current user login session.

items.name: case hidSystemState
items.desc: Specifies that an event source should use the event state table that reflects the combined state of all hardware event sources posting from the HID system.
